bug.short_desc: Click on scroll bar of a combo box selection popup closes the popup
bug.cf_browser_version: Win7 x64 with Firefox 36, Chrome 40, 41, iOS8 Safari on iPad

long_desc.thetext:
After opening the options popup of the combo box, when trying to navigate in a long selection list with the scroll bar of the list, the list closes if clicks are used to navigate with the scroll bar.
So clicking on e.g. below the scroll bar button, in order to navigate one page down, results in the list being closed.
To reproduce use http://tinyurl.com/ne5x5u9 open up the scrollbar and then click below the scrollbar button.
With the demobrowser and demo http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/#widget~ComboBox.html it fails on firefox if the up and down button of scroll bar is clicked. Clicking below or above the scroll bar slider works as expected.
But you are able to navigate if you drag the scroll bar or use the mouse wheel to navigate.
Reproducible on Win7 x64 with Firefox 36, Chrome 40,41. On iOS 8 with Safari on iPad.
Works as expected on Win7 x64 and IE11.
